sense.def:
Stvar, ki je
main
, je najpomembnejša.

seg.quote: What are the main reasons for going to university?
Mrs Foster hurried through the main entrance.
The Worthingtons are in the main decent, friendly folk.

sense.def:
The mains
so cevi ali žice, ki v stavbo dovajajo plin, vodo ali elektriko, ali po katerih iz nje odtekajo odpadne snovi.

seg.quote: The radio we have at home plugs into the mains.
You needn't turn off the mains water.
A bulldozer had cut a gas main.
